ComicInfo.Title: sep 7
ComicInfo.Series: Army of Darkness: Ash Saves Obama
ComicInfo.Summary: After surviving the Necro-Comic-Con 2009, our hero, Ashley J. Williams, wakes to (drum roll please) Dawn of the Dorks. The President has been sold a piece of the Necronomicon, so what's a chosen one to do? Find out in the second chapter of ARMY OF DARKNESS: ASH SAVES OBAMA! You know you want to! This special Army of Darkness mini-series event is written by Elliott (Army of Darkness/Xena) Serrano, illustrated by Ariel Padilla and features covers by Todd (Amazing Spider-Man) Nauck and Lucio Parillo!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 16:17:39. [CVDB171238]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck, Ariel Padilla, Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck
ComicInfo.Inker: Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck, Ariel Padilla, Lucio Parrillo, Todd Nauck
